DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of the Server of track information.
Identification of the User of track/sensor information
DataItem.DataItemNote: The User numbers are predefined in the User registration data base of the ARTAS Unit to which the User wants to connect.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Absolute time stamping of the message in the form of elapsed time since last midnight.
DataItem.DataItemNote: This time is given at an application level (e.g. time at which a message is filled, or time at which a served track is extrapolated), and not at the communication level (i.e. not the time at which the data-block containing the tracks is sent). The time of the day value is reset to 0 at every midnight.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: This data item allows for a more convenient handling of the message at the receiver side by further defining the type of transaction.

Bits.BitsValue: Family: Connections, Nature: Request for connection
Family: Connections, Nature: Request for disconnection
Family: Connections, Nature: connection related report
Family: Track information service definition, Nature: background service
Family: Track information service definition, Nature: synchronised complementary service
Family: Track information service definition, Nature: independent complementary Service
Family: Track information service definition, Nature: Service Request Update : Stop Track/Item Transmission
Family: Track information service definition, Nature: Service Request Update : Start Track/Item Transmission
Family: Track information service definition, Nature: Service Control Request : Interruption
Family: Track information service definition, Nature: Service Control Request : Restart
Family: Track information service definition, Nature: Service Control Request : End of Service
Family: Server messages, Nature: Server Status Message
Family: Server messages, Nature: Track Service Related Report
Family: Server messages, Nature: Sensor information service related report
Family: Sensor information service definition, Nature: service definition
Family: Sensor information service definition, Nature: service control request : Interruption
Family: Sensor information service definition, Nature: service control request : Restart
Family: Sensor information service definition, Nature: service control request : End of Service

DataItem.DataItemNote: The composition of the messages are described by the UAP attached to each FAMILY

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: User password to be sent in the Connection Request.
Identification of the ROLE of a system and of the VERSION of interface.
This item is used to indicate that the default values of parameters required to set a connection are selected.

Bits.BitsValue: the domain of interest shall be the default one in the ARTAS geographical database.
the domain of interest of the User shall be the Domain of interest of the ARTAS Unit to which this User is connected.
the domain of interest is specified in the connection request.
No upper limitation of the domain of interest
An upper limit is specified in the request.
No lower limitation of the Domain of Interest
A lower limit is specified in the request.
A preferred FPPS is specified in the connection request.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Definition of geographical area in the form of a sequence of geographical points.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of points, followed by series of 6-bytes (geographical points) as necessary.

DataItem.DataItemNote: Latitude and Longitude accuracy = 1 second @ 30 m.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Definition of the Lower limit of a Domain of Interest
Definition of the Upper limit of a Domain of Interest
Identification of the Flight Plan Data Processing System from which Flight-Plan related information shall preferably be sent to the User.
Report message sent by the Server to the User in relation to a connection.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of items, followed by series of 1-byte (Acknowledgement message) as necessary

Bits.BitsValue: Connection terminated due to server overload conditions.
Connection terminated by the ARTAS operator.
Server unable to accept the connection (Maximum number of Users already connected)
Incorrect definition of geographical point(s) of the domain of interest
point(s) defined outside the maximum domain of interest
number of points below the minimum value
number of points exceeding the maximum
both specific values and default option have been specified for the same parameter
syntax error in the connection request (e.g. missing item(s))
erroneous Upper/Lower Limits in the definition of the User maximum DoI
connection disallowed by the ARTAS Operator
automatic disconnection due to the absence of active services
crossing lines in the definition of the User maximum DoI
Default DoI outside the maximum Domain of Interest
ARTAS Unit DoI outside the maximum Domain of Interest

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of a service.

DataItemFormat.desc: Variable length data item comprising a first part of one byte followed by a 1-byte extent as necessary.

DataItem.DataItemNote: In the case of ARTAS : only one elementary service identification bit from BS, C1 .. C5 can be set at a time.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: List of aircraft Callsigns indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of items, followed by series of 7-byte (Callsign) as necessary.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: List of Track numbers indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of items, followed by up to 5 series of 2-byte as necessary.

DataItem.DataItemNote: The Track Number Selector contains track numbers (see I030/040).

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: List of Mode S Aircraft Addresses indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of items, followed by series of 3-bytes (24 bits Aircraft Address) as necessary.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: List of Aircraft Identification Mode S items indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of items, followed by series of 6-byte (Aircraft Identification) as necessary.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: List of families of Mode 3/A replies indicated as track selection elements in a Service Request.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of items, followed by series of 2-byte (Mode 3/A Family) as necessary.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: List of Departure Airports indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of items, followed by series of 4-byte (Airport) as necessary

DataItem.DataItemNote: The airport names are indicated in the ICAO location indicators book.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: List of Destination Airports indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of items, followed by series of 4-byte (Airport) as necessary

DataItem.DataItemNote: The airport names are indicated in the ICAO location indicators book.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: List of Aircraft Types indicated as Track Selection elements in a Service Request.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of items, followed by series of 4-byte (Airport) as necessary

DataItem.DataItemNote: The types of aircraft are defined in ICAO Document 4444.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of the Current Control Position to be used as track selector element in a Service Request.
DataItem.DataItemNote: The centre and the control position identification codes have to be defined between communication partners.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: This item defines which categories of tracks and/or flights shall be served.

Bits.BitsValue: Tracks from both live and simulated surveillance reports
All tracks that have a calculated track flight level (I030/160) or a valid last measured Mode C (I030/140) are selected.
All tracks having a calculated track altitude (I030/130) computed using assumed height are selected.
tracks correlated to Flight Plan(s) only
tracks not correlated to Flight Plan(s) only
tentative tracks shall not be sent
tracks with SPI flag shall be sent
tracks with SPI flag shall not be sent
tracks with ME flag shall be sent
tracks with ME flag shall not be sent

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: The Item Selector is used to define the composition of the track information messages. The bits that compose the Item Selector point the items composing the ARTAS Track Information UAP (ATI/UAP).

DataItemFormat.desc: Variable length data item comprising a first part of two bytes, followed by 2-byte extents as necessary.

Bits.BitsName: Communication capability and flight status (Mode S) (I030/386)
Estimated accuracy of calculated track Flight Level (I030/165)
Estimated accuracy of rate of climb/descent (I030/230)
Estimated accuracy of rate of turn (I030/250)

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Definition of the Scanning Period, Update Period, Max Data Flow and Extra Delay (to be considered for the track extrapolation) in case of cyclical service.

Bits.BitsName: Time period between two consecutive batches
Time period between the same batch of two consecutive scans

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Transmission Characteristics for a service of the type radar synchronised.

DataItemFormat.desc: Variable length data item comprising a first part of three bytes, followed by three bytes as necessary.

Bits.BitsValue: a track update shall be sent after the time-window for the plot-to-track association is passed without a plot has been associated.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: This item contains a number of flags to indicate which category(ies) of discrete events shall be considered for triggering the track information transmission (aperiodical way of transmission).

Bits.BitsName: Track Life events (Birth, Death, no radar update)
ARTAS Track Number changes (switch Master/Slave Track Number)
Modification of Flight Plan related information (i.e. in the Minipln)
Flight-plan to Track correlation/end of correlation

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Variation step of Mode-of-Flight Probabilities to trigger the transmission of track information updates (i.e. an update will be sent each time the variation between the current and the last transmitted MOF probability assessment for a given track exceeds the indicated threshold value).

Variation step of the calculated rate of climb/descent to trigger the transmission of track information updates (i.e. an update will be sent each time the variation between the current and the last transmitted assessment of the rate of climb/ descent for a given track exceeds the indicated threshold value).

Variation step of Track positional information to trigger the transmission of track updates. An update will be sent each time the variation between the current track position and the extrapolated position based on the previously sent information exceeds the indicated threshold.

Variation step of the calculated rate of turn to trigger the transmission of track information updates (i.e. an update will be sent each time the variation between the current and the last transmitted assessment of the rate of turn for a given track exceeds the indicated threshold value).

Variation step of heading (i.e. Speed Vector) to trigger the transmission of track information updates (i.e. an update will be sent each time the variation between the current and the last transmitted Track Heading assessment for a given track exceeds the indicated threshold value).

Variation step of Speed Module to trigger the transmission of track information updates (i.e. an update will be sent each time the variation between the current and the last transmitted Speed Module assessment for a given track exceed the indicated threshold value).

A threshold for triggering the transmission of a track. A track update will be sent each time the calculated track altitude or calculated track flight level has changed by more than the indicated amount since the last track update.

The so-called factor K is used to trigger the data transmission as a function of the internal accuracy by which the ARTAS Tracker has estimated the state vector elements. An update will be sent each time one of the state vector elements has varied from more than K time the standard deviation associated to this element.

In relation to a service applying the aperiodical mode of transmission, the Refreshment Period concerns the systematic transmission of track updates for those tracks for which no changes have been detected.

In relation to a service applying the aperiodical mode of transmission, a Minimal Period shall be specified to avoid that too close transmission intervals are applied when highly manoeuvring aircraft are tracked.
Report message sent by the Server to the User in relation to a connection or a service.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of items, followed by series of 2-byte (Acknowledgement message) as necessary.

Bits.BitsValue: Service update request report : stop track/item transmission
Service update request report : start track/item transmission
Service control request report : end of service
Service synchronisation report (periodical or radar synchronised service)
service interrupted by the ARTAS operator
ready for service restart after contingency
Server unable to accept the request (overload conditions)
Service refused, the maximum number of simultaneous services per User being already reached for that User
Incorrect point(s) definition of in the geographical sub-area
Incorrect definition of Upper/Lower Limit(s) in the geographical sub-area
crossing lines in the geographical sub-area
point(s) defined outside the User Domain of Interest
number of points below the minimum value
number of points exceeding the maximum
Repetition Factor of Callsign Selector exceeding the maximum value
Repetition Factor of Track Number Selector exceeding the maximum value
Repetition Factor of Aircraft Address Selector exceeding the maximum value
Repetition Factor of Aircraft Identification Selector exceeding the maximum value
Repetition Factor of Code Family Selector exceeding the maximum value
Repetition Factor of the Departure Airport Selector exceeding the maximum value
Repetition Factor of the Destination Airport Selector exceeding the maximum value
Repetition Factor of Aircraft Type Selector exceeding the maximum value
Mixed definition of periodical/aperiodical transmission characteristics
Update period below the minimum value
Update period over the maximum value
scanning period below the minimum value
scanning period over the maximum value
Extra delay over the maximum value
Max flow below the minimum value
Max flow over the maximum value
More than one Background service have been identified
syntax error in the request (e.g. missing items).
maximum number of simultaneous radar synchronised service is reached.
Main radar outside the maximum user domain of interest
mixed definition of geographical and non-geographical track selection keys
number of exclusion areas exceeding the maximum
number of layers for an exclusion area exceeding the maximum
Mixed definition of item and track selection keys
Incorrect definition of the Upper/Lower limits in the update geographical area
Crossing lines in the definition of the update geographical area
Not possible to restart complementary service while background is interrupted
Service restarted by the ARTAS Operator
Refresh period less or equal than minimal period
Batch period below the minimum value
Update period less than scanning period
Service continuity interrupted due to disconnection with adjacent Unit
Radar synchronised subarea going beyond the ARTAS Unit DoI
Main and backup radars, if any, failed
Time Stamping Bias change threshold out of bounds
SSR Range Bias change threshold out of bounds
SSR Range gain change threshold out of bounds
PR Range Bias change threshold out of bounds
PR Range gain change threshold out of bounds
Repetition Factor of Sensor Selector exceeding the maximum value

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: This item is used to select the precision by which will be coded a cartesian track position
List of Sensor SIC/SAC identifications for which Sensor information are to be provided

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive data item, starting with a one-byte Repetition Factor indicating the number of selected sensors, followed by series of 2-byte (sensor identifications) as necessary.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: This item is used to define the composition of the Sensor Information messages

DataItem.DataItemName: Periodical Characteristics of Sensor Information Service
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Update period of a periodical service of Sensor Information messages

DataItem.DataItemName: Refreshment Period of Sensor Information Service
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Refreshment period of an aperiodical service of Sensor Information messages.

Bits.BitsName: Period of refresh when no change is detected.

DataItem.DataItemName: Discrete Parameters of Sensor Information Service
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Discrete parameters of an aperiodical service of Sensor Information messages. It defines which event(s) shall trigger a message to be sent.

DataItem.DataItemName: Time Stamping Criterion of Sensor Information Service
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Time stamping bias criterion of an aperiodical service of Sensor Information messages.

Bits.BitsName: Variation threshold of the time stamping bias

DataItem.DataItemName: SSR Range Bias Criterion of Sensor Information Service
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: SSR range bias criterion of an aperiodical service of Sensor Information messages.

Bits.BitsName: Variation threshold of the SSR range bias

DataItem.DataItemName: SSR Range Gain Criterion of Sensor Information Service
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: SSR range gain criterion of an aperiodical service of Sensor Information messages

Bits.BitsName: Variation threshold of the SSR range gain

DataItem.DataItemName: SSR Azimuth Bias Criterion of Sensor Information Service
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: SSR azimuth bias criterion of an aperiodical service of Sensor Information messages.

Bits.BitsName: Variation threshold of the SSR azimuth bias

DataItem.DataItemName: PR Range Bias Criterion of Sensor Information Service
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Primary range bias criterion of an aperiodical service of Sensor Information messages.

Bits.BitsName: Variation threshold of the PR range bias

DataItem.DataItemName: PR Range Gain Criterion of Sensor Information Service
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Primary range gain criterion of an aperiodical service of Sensor Information messages

Bits.BitsName: Variation threshold of the PR range gain

DataItem.DataItemName: PR Azimuth Bias Criterion of Sensor Information Service
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Primary azimuth bias criterion of an aperiodical service of Sensor Information messages.

Bits.BitsName: Variation threshold of the PR azimuth bias
